title: Google Tasks adds support for recurring tasks, rolling out now
content:
The to-do list app Google Tasks is finally picking up an overdue feature. Rolling out now, Google Tasks is adding support for recurring tasks in your lists.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Tasks adds support for recurring tasks, rolling out now appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Google Tasks app is now rolling out support for recurring tasks to all users, both in Workspace and free accounts.
